name: Icopy247
overview:
We have been offering our duplication service for many many years since the early days of VHS and when we first invested in CD and DVD duplication equipment. Soon we began to offer our clients a full range of service including packaging and distribution. As technologies advanced and new data storage products became available we began to offer promotional USB flash drives and Blu-ray media. As the company develops over the next few years we plan to stay ahead of others by continually investing in new products and services. The team – our staff play a huge part in our companies success. All of our staff are trained both internally and externally to give tem the widest knowledge of our products and services.

From customer care through to final manufacturing of your product, you won’t find people who understand your needs more than those at iCopy 24/7.
